components.name: thinking-state
components.description: Array of messages or message generators to cycle through

components.name: ai-feedback-collector
components.description: A flexible component for collecting user feedback on AI-generated content. Supports thumbs up/down reactions, optional comments, and custom styling.

components.name: ai-parameter-controls
components.description: AI Parameter Controls - A clean, elegant UI for adjusting common AI model parameters with visual controls, helpful tooltips, and preset configurations.

components.name: token-counter
components.description: Token Counter - A small, elegant UI component that counts tokens in text for AI applications, with visual indicators for approaching limits.
